text: Arasye allahe muminasakalara prati santusta haiche, yetiya te'omloka gachara talata tomara ocarata ba'i'ata grahana karaichila, eteke te'omlokara antarata yi achila seya te'om jani laiche; phalata te'om te'omlokara oparata prasanti aratirna karaile arau te'omlokaka asanna bijayerae puraskrta karaile
